performance.note: These are baseline defaults - run 'pnpm optimize' to generate optimized parameters

notes: These are the default baseline parameters from Phase 5 design
1. Run 'pnpm optimize:quick' for quick test (5-10 mins)
2. Run 'pnpm optimize' for full optimization (20-30 mins)
3. Copy the best parameters from optimization-results-*.json to this file
4. Restart the composite scanner worker to apply new parameters
